thread.section_title: Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: services
thread.title_full: services - Review of Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: peter a
title: services
text:
needs to improve internet coverage
very good breakfast. good choice of food.
stayed at the alie street hotel. restaurant and bar next door not open at lunch times, only open evening time.
very disappointing when you have traveled all morning getting there, only to find you have to go somewhere up the road for coffee while you wait to book in.
